# Welcome {.unnumbered}

Welcome to the Python Foundation Course.

Python Foundation Course is a hands-on training to learn the essentials of the Python programming language, understand the best practices and idioms of the language.

## The Lap Setup

A jupyterhub instance is in the cloud is setup for this training which provides a jupyter lab instance for every participant.

You can access it from <https://lab.pipal.in/>.

The username will be your first name in lowercase and the password will be shared with all you in first session.

## Live Notes

The live trianing notes presented by the instuctor will be available live at <https://live.lab.pipal.in/>.

You can use this to browse through the notes if you need to refer to a concept covered a few minutes ago, or look the codes examples covered earlier.
